revised_title: Spinless Rectilinear Motion of a Uniformly Electrified Sphere
tldr: The author presents a rigorous and exact expression for the total mechanical reaction on a sphere in spinless rectilinear motion, with a speed always less than the speed of light. The expression includes the electromagnetic mass term, radiation pressure term, and higher-order terms related to the sphere's radius. The author applies this expression to cases of continuous uniform acceleration and hyperbolic rectilinear motion.
